listings.title: Winter is Here Crochet Blanket Pattern
listings.description: Make yourself a warm and cozy crochet blanket pattern perfect for those chilly winter nights.
listings.materials: Bernat Blanket Yarn, faux fur, acrylic yarn, and sewing thread

listings.title: West Coaster- Crochet Coasters Pattern
listings.description: Designed to mimic sacred geometric shapes found on the West Coast, sea shells and fern spirals. Make these as the perfect housewarming gift!

listings.title: Hound Hoodies Crochet Pattern
listings.description: 9 fun animal crochet hoodie patterns to keep your pup warm and fashionable. Make these patterns to create the perfect Halloween costume for your best friend!
listings.materials: Acrylic yarn, Lion Brand Yarn Thick & Quick, polyfill stuffing

listings.title: Handmade Knit Chunky Beanie
listings.description: A beautifully hand-knit beanie made with soft, high-quality yarn and a faux fur pompom. Can be ordered in Mommy-and-Me sizes!
listings.materials: Acrylic Yarn and faux fur pompom

listings.title: Crochet Woven Baby Blanket
listings.description: A delicate and soft crochet baby blanket perfect for a newborn to snuggle up to.

listings.title: Knit Pumpkins
listings.description: These cute and squishy pumpkins are the perfect Fall accent for your home or to give as a housewarming gift.
listings.materials: Chunky acrylic yarn, polyfill stuffing, and a cinnamon stick stem.

listings.title: Mountain Beanie
listings.description: Keep yourself cozy and warm in this luxurious chunky Mountain Beanie with a removable faux fur pom pom!

listings.title: Nesting Bowls
listings.description: These nesting baskets are both beautiful and useful. Useful to hold those loose odds and ends around the house or in a bathroom to neatly display toiletries.

listings.title: Stitch Markers
listings.description: This set of 4 stitch markers can be personalized with any initial by using metal stamps to embellish the coins.
listings.materials: Rose gold plated brass coins & jumps rings
